metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20314 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Stack buffer overflow in libspf2 versions below 1.2.11 when processingcertain SPF macros can lead to Denial of service and potentially codeexecution via malicious crafted SPF explanation messages.

criterions.comment: libspf2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
